entities.description: The type of relationship between the victim and the offender.
The raw frequency count of each relationship type without weighting.
The percentage representation of each relationship type in the dataset.
The type of variable assigned to the relationship measurements.
Information about the presence of missing data in the dataset.

relationships.description: Defines the relationship between the victim and the offender.
Specifies the unweighted frequency of the relationship type.
Specifies the percentage representation of the relationship type.
Indicates the type of variable for the relationship measurement.
Identifies the missing data elements within the dataset.
